data.lyric:
[ti:Chasin' You]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:If I Know Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Chasin' You - Morgan Wallen
[00:06.61]We used to chase that Chattanooga freight
[00:09.24]
[00:09.98]Couple a kids in a Chevrolet
[00:11.50]
[00:12.21]Catch a little air when we cross the tracks
[00:14.56]Sipping on something from a paper stack
[00:17.05]You hang your shirt on that maple lamp
[00:19.50]Slipping through the moon to the river bend
[00:21.36]
[00:22.04]Wasn't very long til I was jumping in jumping in
[00:25.08]
[00:25.81]I guess I'm still doing now what I was doing then
[00:30.11]
[00:30.72]Chasing you like a shot of whiskey
[00:35.89]Burning going down burning going down
[00:40.77]Chasing you like those goodbye taillights
[00:45.83]
[00:46.45]Heading west to anywhere out of this no where town
[00:50.48]Chasing that freedom chasing that feeling that got gone too soon
[00:54.87]
[00:55.44]Chasing that you and me I only see in my rear view
[01:00.48]Yeah I'm laying every night holding someone new
[01:05.14]Still chasing you still chasing you
[01:08.94]
[01:16.55]You always used to talk about LA
[01:18.28]
[01:18.98]I heard you got as far as Santa Fe
[01:20.71]
[01:21.42]Oh wait you know I tried to track you down
[01:23.36]
[01:23.86]I only got as far as get saw town
[01:28.83]Singing about a girl I used to know used to know
[01:31.93]
[01:32.52]You should know that I haven't given up
[01:37.63]I'm just on your radio
[01:39.43]
[01:40.05]Chasing you like a shot of whiskey
[01:45.19]Burning going down burning going down
[01:50.00]Chasing you like those goodbye taillights
[01:54.78]
[01:55.69]Heading west to anywhere out of this no where town
[01:59.58]Chasing that freedom chasing that feeling that got gone too soon
[02:04.12]
[02:04.72]Chasing that you and me I only see in my rear view
[02:09.16]
[02:09.78]Yeah I'm laying every night holding someone new
[02:14.41]Still chasing you still chasing you
[02:18.41]
[02:29.60]Chasing you like a shot of whiskey
[02:34.69]Burning going down burning going down
[02:39.47]Chasing you like those good bye taillights
[02:44.63]
[02:45.26]Heading west to anywhere out of this no where town
[02:48.71]
[02:49.22]Chasing that freedom chasing that feeling that got gone too soon
[02:53.61]
[02:54.16]Chasing that you and me I only see in my rear view
[02:58.67]
[02:59.26]Yeah I'm laying every night holding someone new
[03:03.89]Still chasing you still chasing you
[03:07.82]
[03:08.68]Still chasing you still chasing you
data.trans:
[ti:Chasin' You]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:If I Know Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.61]我们曾追逐着那趟开往田纳西州查特努加市的货运列车
[00:09.24]
[00:09.98]年少时 我们开着雪佛兰车子
[00:11.50]
[00:12.21]当我们驶过铁轨 清风拂面
[00:14.56]啜饮着用纸随意包着的饮料
[00:17.05]你把衬衫挂在枫树的枝干上
[00:19.50]借着皎洁的月光 顺势游到河岸边
[00:21.36]
[00:22.04]没过多久 我也跳入水中
[00:25.08]
[00:25.81]我想即使是现在 我也会像当年一样
[00:30.11]
[00:30.72]你犹如醉人的威士忌酒 我紧紧追随着你
[00:35.89]迷恋着你 爱火从未消退
[00:40.77]我紧紧追随着你 我还记得在车灯的映衬下与你告别
[00:45.83]
[00:46.45]一路向西 驶出这个不知名的小镇
[00:50.48]追逐自由 追逐那转瞬即逝的美好感觉
[00:54.87]
[00:55.44]追寻着你我的过去 我只在后视镜里看见我们的背影
[01:00.48]每晚 我流连在陌生人的怀抱
[01:05.14]我的心依然追寻你 对你念念不忘
[01:08.94]
[01:16.55]你总是跟我聊起洛杉矶的种种见闻
[01:18.28]
[01:18.98]我听说你四处漂泊 甚至去了圣达菲
[01:20.71]
[01:21.42]等等 你知道我试图找过你
[01:23.36]
[01:23.86]可我还是没走出这座小镇
[01:28.83]唱起歌 献给我我曾经爱过的女孩
[01:31.93]
[01:32.52]你应该知道我仍未放弃
[01:37.63]你的收音机里传来我的歌声
[01:39.43]
[01:40.05]你犹如醉人的威士忌酒 我紧紧追随着你
[01:45.19]迷恋着你 爱火从未消退
[01:50.00]我紧紧追随着你 我还记得在车灯的映衬下与你告别
[01:54.78]
[01:55.69]一路向西 驶出这个不知名的小镇
[01:59.58]追逐自由 追逐那转瞬即逝的美好感觉
[02:04.12]
[02:04.72]追寻着你我的过去 我只在后视镜里看见我们的背影
[02:09.16]
[02:09.78]每晚 我流连在陌生人的怀抱
[02:14.41]我的心依然追寻你 对你念念不忘
[02:18.41]
[02:29.60]你犹如醉人的威士忌酒 我紧紧追随着你
[02:34.69]迷恋着你 爱火从未消退
[02:39.47]我紧紧追随着你 我还记得在车灯的映衬下与你告别
[02:44.63]
[02:45.26]一路向西 驶出这个不知名的小镇
[02:48.71]
[02:49.22]追逐自由 追逐那转瞬即逝的美好感觉
[02:53.61]
[02:54.16]追寻着你我的过去 我只在后视镜里看见我们的背影
[02:58.67]
[02:59.26]每晚 我流连在陌生人的怀抱
[03:03.89]我的心依然追寻你 对你念念不忘
[03:07.82]
[03:08.68]我的心依然追寻你 对你念念不忘
